#include <iostream>
#include <string.h>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
int t;
cin>>t;
while(t--){
    char a[1000];
    char b[1000];
    cin>>a;
    cin>>b;
    int len1=strlen(a);
    int len2=strlen(b);
    if(len1!=len2){
        cout<<-1<<endl;
        continue;
    }
    int i=0;
    int ans=0;
    while(i<len1){
        if(a[i]!=b[i])ans++;
        i++;
    }
    cout<<ans<<endl;
}

}
